response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, considering its importance to both parties. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,000,000. We trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
